original_title: 爆裂パチンカー・スーパー大回転　炎の無限継続打法
overview: Rika is a genius "pachinker" on the road to university. Her and her friend Riona are known as the "Undefeated Queens." They always win big at pachinko, but Rika's boyfriend Tohru hates gambling!
tagline: Starring sexy actress Nao! Beautiful elite pachinkers uncover injustice in gambling entertainment!
title: Super Tornado
